law.text: The owner's permit shall contain the name and address of the owner to whom it is granted, the number, kind and description of the vehicles the operation of which is authorized by such owner's permit, and a statement that the permit is issued subject to full compliance with the provisions of the taxicab control ordinance of the City and all other ordinances and laws governing the operation of taxicabs in the City, and subject to revocation as provided by the taxicab control ordinance. Each owner's permit shall bear the signature or facsimile signature of the City Clerk and the official seal of the City. (Code 1959 , ยง22-30)
